title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The process of updating the checked state of the table takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case). During this time, there is no indication of ongoing activity. A busy cursor should be displayed to provide visual feedback to the user.
EB: When updating the checkboxes' state in the table, a busy cursor should be displayed, providing a clear visual indication that the process is underway. This should improve the user experience by reducing uncertainty during the update.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the 'Export Zip' feature.
2. Perform actions that trigger the updating of checkboxes in the table.
3. Observe the absence of a busy cursor during the checkbox update process, indicating the need for visual feedback.
4. Confirm that the addition of a busy cursor enhances the user experience by providing a clear indication of ongoing activity.
